@notice Gets all the secrets the sender knows
 @return Array of all the secret IDs

params._encryptedSecret: Address-specific encrypted version of the secret
params._name: Name of the new user, selected by the owner
params._publicKey: Public key of the new user

getIndexOfAddress(uint256,address).details: returns -1 if the address does not have access to this secret

params._address: Address for which an index will be provided

returns._encryptedSecret: Sender-specific encrypted version of the secret

returns._0: Array of all the secret IDs

returns._addresses: Addresses for each user allowed access to the secret
returns._encryptedSecret: Sender-specific encrypted version of the secret

params._userId: ID of the old user, given by getIndexOfAddress(address _address)

addNewUser(uint256,address,string,string.notice: adds a user to a secret with no access.  Must be run before trying to change an address' permissions

getIndexOfAddress(uint256,address).notice: Gets the index of an address

getSecret(uint256).notice: Gets a secret by its ID

getUserSecrets().notice: Gets all the secrets the sender knows

makeAddressEditor(uint256,address).notice: Lets the owner of a secret make an address an editor

makeAddressOwner(uint256,address).notice: Lets the owner of a secret transfer ownership

makeAddressViewer(uint256,address).notice: Lets the owner of a secret make an address a viewer

ownerGetSecret(uint256).notice: Gets all information on a secret

removeUserFromSecret(uint256,address,uin.notice: Lets the owner of a secret remove a user from the secret
